## TNodeGetPathParams.reversed property

Whether to reverse the constructed path. Defaults to `false`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
reversed?: boolean;
```

## Example


```typescript
// for a branch such as: root -\> child -\> grandChild -\> node
node.$.path({ reversed: true }); // -\> 'node/grandChild/child/root'
```
